results.title: prettier extension not working in Visual Studio Code - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: How to fix the prettier extension not working in Visual Studio Code| Thank you for reaching out. If the prettier extension is not formatting your files in Visual Studio Code, please try the following steps: Ensure Prettier - Code formatter is installed and enabled. If you find this helpful, Kindly mark the provided solution as "Accept.
